resources.string:
What is Biciklo?

You can now get rental service of bicycle near to your location. Download app an enjoy easy and smooth experience of bicycle riding.

Who Should use Biciklo?

Any one who is looking for some low-priced and healthy medium for travel, where he/she can request a bicycle through phone or just want to opt bicycle ride for shorter distance or care about the environment and are ready to use this service for their local commute.
Tap to attach KYC document image
Please attach kyc document to proceed.
